t: About Voice Search - Amazon Customer Service
s: Find more solutions · When you tap the microphone icon in the search bar and begin speaking, a recording of what you said is sent to Amazon's cloud where we process your request. As you're speaking, we transcribe what you say into text and show it in the search bar.

t: Amazon Alexa Voice AI | Alexa Developer Official Site
s: Alexa is Amazon's cloud-based voice service that allows voice developers to create and manage their voice apps and integrate them with Alexa-related smart devices. Visit the Alexa Developer site to view a comprehensive tutorial.

t: Brand Voice : Amazon donne une voix aux marques - Vokode - Vokode
s: February 7, 2020 - AWS travaille au développement de « Brand Voice », une fonctionnalité permettant aux marques de créer des voix synthétiques pour leurs applications vocales.
